hardcover.config.alternative_recipe_book: Adds one extra row of recipe results by rearranging the search field and navigation buttons.
hardcover.config.alternative_recipe_butt: Displays the resulting item instead of the recipe, and a tooltip shows the material list.
Automatically close the recipe book when a supported screen is closed.
hardcover.config.bounce.tooltip: Toggles the subtle bounce effect seen when new recipes are added.
hardcover.config.centered_inventory.tool: Centers the inventory and prevents it from moving when the recipe book is opened.
hardcover.config.circular_scrolling.tool: Enables circular scrolling when using the next and previous buttons.
hardcover.config.compact_creative_tabs.t: Show more categories in the recipe book by reducing tab size.
hardcover.config.creative_tabs.tooltip: Categorize recipes based on item groups, similar to the Creative inventory.
hardcover.config.invert_scroll_direction: Inverts the scroll direction when using the mouse wheel.
hardcover.config.mouse_wheel_scrolling.t: Enables mouse wheel scrolling within the recipe book.
hardcover.config.quick_craft.tooltip: Quickly craft items by clicking on recipes while pressing the 'Quick Craft' keybinding.
hardcover.config.recipe_book.tooltip: Toggles the recipe book button in supported screens.
hardcover.config.ungroup_recipes.tooltip: Ungroup any grouped recipes into single recipes.
hardcover.config.unlock_all_recipes.tool: Unlock all recipes when a player enters a single player world.
